author: James Tanner
method: Strain the beans and place in a saucepan over a medium heat. Add the sugar, spices, vinegar and water. Heat through for five minutes and pour into a bowl to serve.
ingredients: 400g/14oz tin of baked beans,  1 tsp brown sugar,  ½ tsp cumin,  ½ tsp chilli powder,  1 tsp balsamic vinegar
